title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Symbiotic Relationships Between Organizational Learning and Bureaucracy in the Era of Technological Complexity

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners derive a theoretical framework explaining how organizational learning’s bureaucratic dependency changes according to technological complexity levels.
Learners identify mechanisms by which bureaucracy contributes to large-scale knowledge integration through industry-specific case analyses.
Learners evaluate the impact of division of labor, standardization, and centralization on learning processes in VR simulation environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
